Action.name: install-mossaic
Action.command: mkdir -p /opt/mossaic/staging && curl -o /opt/mossaic/staging/mossaic-0.3.0.rc3.tar.gz http://vm-37-00.dice.cluster/tarballs/mossaic-0.3.0.rc3.tar.gz && cd /opt/mossaic/staging && tar xvfz mossaic-0.3.0.rc3.tar.gz

Action.name: create-mossaic-user
Action.command: groupadd mossaic && useradd -c "mossaic system user" -d /opt/mossaic -g mossaic mossaic
